task.summary: Renamed Main2Activity class to HelpActivity This should help with code clarity.

Added models folder, containing classes which the lesson.json files will map to. See slack for example of the format. Added Gson library for the purposes of Json to Java object conversion Added pickiT library for the purposes of file selection in the LessonActivity Added LessonActivity: Allows user to upload a .json file from drive. This file is then stored in the internal app storage under the name specified in the file.

Added models folder, containing classes which the lesson.json files will map to. See slack for example of the format. Added Gson library for the purposes of Json to Java object conversion Added pickiT library for the purposes of file selection in the LessonActivity Added LessonActivity: Allows user to upload a .json file from drive. This file is then stored in the internal app storage under the name specified in the file.

Added TeachActivity: Activity where lessons are conducted in.
Functionality: - Added text to speech using android.speech.tts - Added speech to text using android.speech - Json to java using Gson library - Workflow for lesson: Greeting > SegmentText > Question > Answer - Score shown at end of lesson
Notes: - State of lesson stored in variables currentState, currentSegment etc. - Callback methods for TTS and SpeechRecognition are onDone(...) and onResults(...) respectively

Linked MainActivity to TeachActivity - Scrapped the menu and buttons, added a ListView connected to an ArrayAdapter. - Array fetches and displays files from the internal app storage - List is dynamically created onStart and onResume to account for lesson additions through lessonActivity - Added onClick listener to each list view item, which starts the TeachActivity and loads corresponding lesson (sends a string through intent.putExtra(...)
Linked TeachActivity to MainActivity - If user declines to start the lesson, app takes them back to MainActivity - If user finishes the lesson, app takes them back to MainActivity after delaying for 2 seconds to display the results message
Changed titles of MainActivity to Truckie Academy. Changed title of LearnActivity and TeachActivity
Removed classes that are now unused. Enabled user to exit using voice in TeachActivity.
Fixed bug where bot stalls if user does not answer with correct input.

Added database support - Store user data (score, date etc) of lessons in database Added ProgressActivity - Pulls data from database, showing progress of each lesson - Shows percentage of lessons complete Added cloud storage - Files are now uploaded from Firebase Storage instead of Google drive Moved add lesson functionality to MainActivity Changed styling of app Cleaned up login page Cleaned up action bars so text is more readable Changed 'Home' to 'Lessons' in MainActivity's action bar
Minor changes to styling Finished add functionality from Firebase storage

MESSAGE.value: Renamed Main2Activity class to HelpActivity This should help with code clarity.

Added models folder, containing classes which the lesson.json files will map to. See slack for example of the format. Added Gson library for the purposes of Json to Java object conversion Added pickiT library for the purposes of file selection in the LessonActivity Added LessonActivity: Allows user to upload a .json file from drive. This file is then stored in the internal app storage under the name specified in the file.

Added TeachActivity: Activity where lessons are conducted in.
Functionality: - Added text to speech using android.speech.tts - Added speech to text using android.speech - Json to java using Gson library - Workflow for lesson: Greeting > SegmentText > Question > Answer - Score shown at end of lesson
Notes: - State of lesson stored in variables currentState, currentSegment etc. - Callback methods for TTS and SpeechRecognition are onDone(...) and onResults(...) respectively

Linked MainActivity to TeachActivity - Scrapped the menu and buttons, added a ListView connected to an ArrayAdapter. - Array fetches and displays files from the internal app storage - List is dynamically created onStart and onResume to account for lesson additions through lessonActivity - Added onClick listener to each list view item, which starts the TeachActivity and loads corresponding lesson (sends a string through intent.putExtra(...)
Linked TeachActivity to MainActivity - If user declines to start the lesson, app takes them back to MainActivity - If user finishes the lesson, app takes them back to MainActivity after delaying for 2 seconds to display the results message
Changed titles of MainActivity to Truckie Academy. Changed title of LearnActivity and TeachActivity
Removed classes that are now unused. Enabled user to exit using voice in TeachActivity.
Fixed bug where bot stalls if user does not answer with correct input.

Added database support - Store user data (score, date etc) of lessons in database Added ProgressActivity - Pulls data from database, showing progress of each lesson - Shows percentage of lessons complete Added cloud storage - Files are now uploaded from Firebase Storage instead of Google drive Moved add lesson functionality to MainActivity Changed styling of app Cleaned up login page Cleaned up action bars so text is more readable Changed 'Home' to 'Lessons' in MainActivity's action bar
Minor changes to styling Finished add functionality from Firebase storage
